page.title: 15SHOPPING AND FOOD SUPPLIES
page.content: In this area, there are only two small shops selling essential groceries and household items. The milk roundsman will also supply dairy products, eggs, fruit juices, bread and potatoes, which is very useful for those who are housebound or isolated. Other mobile services include a Greengrocer, Fish- monger (both weekly) and a monthly Frozen Food Delivery Service. However, the majority of shopping is done in Canterbury or nearby towns. Groceries are usually bought at the large Super- markets which carry a wide range of goods and offer parking facilities. Today's trend seems to be towards bulk shopping once a month. The possession of fridges and freezers, and the fact that many workers are now salaried, helps to make this possible. Meat is purchased from Bridge, Barham or town, and some will buy in bulk for freezing
